ingredients.content: 20 g wholemeal grain (e.g. barley grain or oat groats)

preparations.content: Place whole grain in mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add fruit and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b> then scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add milk and mix <b>2 sec/speed 6<b>, then cook <b>6-8 min/90°C/speed 2<b>.
Purée <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>, then, without measuring cup, mix <b>8 min/speed 3<b> to cool purée down. Transfer to a bowl and serve.
